original_text: But the centurion paid more attention to the pilot and to the owner of the ship than to what Paul said.
korean_text: 백부장이 선장과 선주의 말을 바울의 말보다 더 믿더라

sentences.original_text: But the centurion paid more attention to the pilot
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 백부장은 조선사에게 더 주의를 기울였습니다

sentences.original_text: and to the owner of the ship
